message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for $1,100,000. It's a fantastic deal for you, as it's well below its true market value. I believe this product will be a significant asset to your business, and I'm confident you'll find it very profitable. Let me know if you're interested, as I'm happy to answer any questions you may have. If you decline, I have another buyer lined up at a higher price.
